alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 4:58PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Deschutes County through 530 PM PDT... At 458 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bend, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bend and Deschutes River Woods. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
